name: calculate_exponential_growth_decay
description: Calculates the exponential growth or decay of a quantity over a specified time period. The function can handle both growth and decay scenarios based on the provided parameters.

initial_value.description: The initial value of the quantity.

rate.description: The growth or decay rate (in percentage).

time.description: The time over which the calculation is performed.

decay.description: If true, the function calculates decay; if false, it calculates growth. Defaults to false.
